message.body: Hey. I just realized. You know that you have until this Friday to put in for time off on the 3rd and possibly the 6th, right?
And no meat to make bulgogi :( Now I want beef cubes. It sucks that they're such a rip off now.
Why do I have to do that?
You should always give two weeks in advanced for time off so they can approve it. It's just proper protocol. You'll probably still get the day if you wait, but it looks better to do it early.
I'm leaving now. I still have to go to Urban Outfitters
Don't worry about that. I can do it over the weekend.
